title: B-52s, SNL, and Prison Wine
teaser:
A special live edition of The Moth in NYC’s Central Park.  Comic Jessi Klein lands her childhood dream job writing for Saturday Night Live; a prisoner in Attica is caught making alcohol in his cell; and a woman rebounds with style from her husband’s infidelity. Hosted by Jay Allison, producer of The Moth Radio Hour.
 
The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.
contentencoded:
Jessi Klein lands what she thinks is her dream job, writing for SNL.
 
Sherman “O.T.” Powell is incarcerated in Attica and starts up a secret business making “hooch.”
 
Bonnie Levison discovers that her husband is cheating but her friends gather around to find her the perfect date.

Hosted by Jay Allison
